creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
inscription:
L: 高登望辺時後楽之

L edge, see notes for translation
markings: L edge, below signature, diagonally oriented square intaglio: 湯??相濁; L edge, below signature, diagonally oriented square relief: 有恪之印 {Yūkaku no in}; center of R edge, oval intaglio: 聱牙齋{Gōgasai }; sticker R roller cap, old sticker
signed: L edge, center: 土井生作 {Doi seisaku}
title: Kappa Blowing Out his Soul
